text: Datura is a kind of plant. It is a genus of nine species of very poisonous, vespertine-flowering plants belonging to the nightshade family (Solanaceae).1959 Avery, Amos Geer, Satina, Sophie and Rietsema, Jacob Blakeslee: the genus Datura, foreword and biographical sketch by Edmund W. Sinnott, pub. New York : Ronald Press Co. ==Sources== Category:Solanaceae
title: Datura
